sections.name: Select Matching Property
sections.toolTip: Selects matching properties across selected layers

sections.name: Inverse Selection
sections.toolTip: Inverts layer selection

sections.name: Select Layers at Frame
sections.toolTip: Selects all layers under the playhead at frame

sections.name: Select Odd/Even Layers
sections.toolTip: Selects layers with odd or even numbers in the active comp

sections.name: Random Select/Deselect
sections.toolTip: Selects layers at random and deselects layers at random if already selected

sections.name: Select Text Objects
sections.toolTip:
Selects all text layers in the active comp
Shift + Click: Selects all layers exept text layers

sections.name: Select Nulls
sections.toolTip:
Selects all null layers in the active comp
Shift + Click: Selects all layers except null layers

sections.name: Select Precomps
sections.toolTip:
Selects all pre-comps in the active comp
Shift + Click: Selects all layers except pre-comps

sections.name: Select Shape Objects
sections.toolTip:
Selects all shape objects in the active comp
Shift + Click: Selects all layers except shape objects

sections.name: Select 3D Layers
sections.toolTip:
Selects all 3D layers in the active comp
Shift + Click: Selects all layers except 3D layers

sections.name: Select Guide Layers
sections.toolTip:
Selects all guide layers in the active comp
Shift + Click: Selects all layers except guide layers

sections.name: Select Lights
sections.toolTip:
Selects all lights in the active comp
Shift + Click: Selects all layers except lights

sections.name: Select Audio Layers
sections.toolTip:
Selects all audio layers in the active comp
Shift + Click: Selects all layers except audio layers

sections.name: Select All Parent Layers
sections.toolTip: Selects all parent layers in a hierarchy

sections.name: Select All Child Layers
sections.toolTip: Selects all child layers in a hierarchy

sections.name: Select Complete Hierarchy
sections.toolTip:
Selects all child layers parented to the selected layers
Ctrl + Click: Selects all hierarchy
Shift + Click: Adds selection to the previously selected layers

sections.name: Set/Select Layer Group
sections.toolTip:
Sets and retrieves a user defined selection of multiple layers
Click: Set layer selection | Shift + Click: Activate selection

sections.name: Duplicate Layers
sections.toolTip: Duplicates selected layers with the option to offset copies along x, y, z axes

sections.name: Shift Layer Times
sections.toolTip: Moves selected layers together on the timeline to current time

sections.name: Order Layers
sections.toolTip:
Orders selected layers on the timeline by selection order,
in/out points, names or at random
Ctrl + Click: Reverses selected layers order
Shift + Click: Orders layers by selection

sections.name: Offset Layers
sections.toolTip: Offsets, trims, sequences or randomises selected layers on the timeline

sections.name: Rename Layers
sections.toolTip: Batch renames selected layers with number increments

sections.name: Trim Layers
sections.toolTip: Trims selected layers by their first and last keys

sections.name: Set Label Colors
sections.toolTip:
Changes selected layers' label colors by order,
hierarchy or type for improved contrast

sections.name: Set Anchor Point
sections.toolTip:
Sets anchor points for selected layers with
the option to add expression controls
Ctrl + Click: Set anchor point to layer(s) center

sections.name: Parent to Null
sections.toolTip:
Parents selected layers to new nulls with null type,
naming and hierarchy options
Ctrl + Click: Parent layer to null based on last settings

sections.name: Parent to First Selected
sections.toolTip: Parents selected layers to the first layer selected

sections.name: Parent to Above Layer
sections.toolTip: Parents selected layers to the next layer above each

sections.name: Parent in Order of Selection
sections.toolTip: Parents selected layers as a hierarchy chain in order of selection

sections.name: Trim Mattes to Layers
sections.toolTip: Trims matte layers to match their target layers' in/out points

sections.name: Rename Matte Layers
sections.toolTip: Batch renames matte layers to match their target layers

sections.name: Hide Matte Layers
sections.toolTip: Hides all matte layers

sections.name: Apply Matte Layer
sections.toolTip: Applies matte on selected layers with additional matte type options

sections.name: Lock/Unlock All Layers
sections.toolTip: Locks and unlocks all layers in the active comp

sections.name: Lock/Unlock Shy Layers
sections.toolTip: Locks and unlocks all shy layers in the active comp

sections.name: Set/Select Keys Group
sections.toolTip:
Sets and retrieves a user defined selection of multiple keys
Click: Set key selection | Shift + Click: Activate selection

sections.name: Snap Keys to Frames (Time)
sections.toolTip: Snaps selected keyframes each to their nearest frame on the timeline

sections.name: Fix Overshooting Keys (Spatial)
sections.toolTip:
Fixes overshooting motion paths by applying linear
interpolation between identical position keys

sections.name: Clone Keys
sections.toolTip: Duplicates selected keys, supports selection across multiple properties

sections.name: Clone & Mirror Keys
sections.toolTip:
Clones and time-reverses selected keys,
supports selection across multiple properties

sections.name: Time-Reverse Keys
sections.toolTip: Inverts keys over time

sections.name: Shift Keys in Time
sections.toolTip:
Moves selected keys together on the timeline
 Ctrl + Click: Moves keys to current time

sections.name: Offset Keys
sections.toolTip:
Offsets selected keys in properties by a number of frames
or seconds defined by user

sections.name: Move Keys to Current Time
sections.toolTip:
Moves and aligns together selected keys
across multiple properties to current time

sections.name: Move Keys to In Point
sections.toolTip:
Moves and aligns together selected keys
across multiple properties to the in point of layer

sections.name: Move Keys to Out Point
sections.toolTip:
Moves and aligns togetger selected keys
across multiple properties from the out point of layer

sections.name: Left Align Keys
sections.toolTip:
Aligns selected keys across multiple properties
to the left-most key in the layer

sections.name: Right Align Keys
sections.toolTip:
Aligns selected keys across multiple properties
from the right-most key in the layer

sections.name: Key Looper
sections.toolTip:
Applies an expression to selected properties
to loop keys in and/or out with options

sections.name: Create Camera Rig
sections.toolTip: Creates a camera rig with easily accessible and animatable settings in one place

sections.name: Auto Trim Comp
sections.toolTip: Trims or lenghtens the active comp's duration by the in/out points of its layers

sections.name: Auto Crop Comps
sections.toolTip: Crops the active comp or selected comps

sections.name: Pre-Compose
sections.toolTip: Pre-composes selected layers with additional options to pre-comp each individually and auto-crop

sections.name: Batch Rename Comps
sections.toolTip: Search and replace text in comp titles

sections.name: Batch Scale Comps
sections.toolTip: Scales multiple compositions

sections.name: Batch Resize Canvas
sections.toolTip: Resizes multiple compositions

sections.name: Batch Comp Settings
sections.toolTip: Apply comp settings to multiple compositions

sections.name: Batch Color Replacer
sections.toolTip: Finds and replaces colors in selected comps or across the entire project

sections.name: Export Comps as New Project
sections.toolTip: Creates a new project file containing selected comps

sections.name: Reveal Selected Layer Assets
sections.toolTip: Highlights selected layers' dependencies in the project panel

sections.name: Reveal Current Comp
sections.toolTip: Highlights the active comp in the project panel

sections.name: Reveal Project Folder
sections.toolTip: Reveals the project folder location

sections.name: Reveal AE Script Folder
sections.toolTip: Reveals After Effects script folder location

sections.name: Create Folder Structure
sections.toolTip:
Creates a hierarchy of folders in the project panel
with presets based on typical use-case scenarios

sections.name: Organize Project
sections.toolTip:
Organizes project assets by type in folders
with user customisable names

sections.name: Project Cleanup
sections.toolTip:
Cleans up the project by removing unused items,
disabled effects and expressions

sections.name: Show/Hide Guides
sections.toolTip: Shows or hides all guides

sections.name: Lock/Unlock Guides
sections.toolTip: Locks or unlocks all guides

sections.name: Toggle Snap to Guides
sections.toolTip: Toggles snap to guides option on and off

sections.name: Clear Guides
sections.toolTip: Deletes all guides

sections.name: Add Guides Around
sections.toolTip: Places guides around selected layers' boundaries

sections.name: Add Guides Left
sections.toolTip: Places guides on the left edge of the active comp or selected layers

sections.name: Add Guides Right
sections.toolTip: Places guides on the right edge of the active comp or selected layers

sections.name: Add Guides Top
sections.toolTip: Places guides on the top edge of selected layers

sections.name: Add Guides Bottom
sections.toolTip: Places guides on the bottom edge of selected layers

sections.name: Add Guides Center
sections.toolTip: Places guides at the (horizontal) center of selected layers

sections.name: Add Guides Middle
sections.toolTip: Places guides in the (vertical) middle of selected layers

sections.name: Add Guides Anchor
sections.toolTip: Places guides at the anchor points of selected layers

sections.name: Create Guide/Grid System
sections.toolTip: Creates a guide or grid system with the option of adding gutters

sections.name: Golden Ratio
sections.toolTip: Adds a golden ratio reference layer

sections.name: Solo Layers (Viewer)
sections.toolTip: Displays only the selected layers in the viewer

sections.name: Solo Layers (Timeline)
sections.toolTip: Hides all but the selected layers on the timeline as shy layers

sections.name: White BG
sections.toolTip:
Sets active comp background color setting to white
Ctrl + Click: Sets background color for selected comps

sections.name: Black BG
sections.toolTip:
Sets active comp  background color setting to black
Ctrl + Click: Sets background color for selected comps

sections.name: Gray BG
sections.toolTip:
Sets active comp background color setting to gray
Ctrl + Click: Sets background color for selected comps

sections.name: Set BG Color
sections.toolTip:
Sets active comp background color setting to custom color
Ctrl + Click: Sets background color for selected comps

sections.name: Toggle Checkerboard
sections.toolTip:
Toggles the transparency grid in the viewer
Ctrl + Click: Sets background color for selected comps

sections.name: Reset View (100%)
sections.toolTip:
Recenters selected comps or active comp in the viewer
at 100% scale, hides guides and rulers
Ctrl + Click: Resets viewer for selected comps

sections.name: Reset View (50%)
sections.toolTip:
Recenters selected comps or active comp in the viewer
at 50% scale, hides guides and rulers
Ctrl + Click: Resets viewer for selected comps

sections.name: Reset View (33%)
sections.toolTip:
Recenters selected comps or active comp in the viewer
at 33% scale, hides guides and rulers
Ctrl + Click: Resets viewer for selected comps

sections.name: Save Screenshot
sections.toolTip:
Takes a screenshot of the active comp
Ctrl + Click: Takes screenshots of the selected comps

sections.name: Enable Expressions
sections.toolTip: Enables expressions in selected layers or properties in the active comp

sections.name: Disable Expressions
sections.toolTip: Disables expressions in selected layers or properties in the active comp

sections.name: Remove Expressions
sections.toolTip: Removes expressions in selected layers or properties in the active comp

sections.name: Bake Expressions
sections.toolTip: Bakes selected expressions into their layer properties as keys

sections.name: Find and Replace Expressions
sections.toolTip:
Finds and replaces strings in expressions on selected layers or properties,
or across the entire project

sections.name: Remove Expressions with Errors
sections.toolTip: Clears expressions that return errors across the entire project

sections.name: Circle Wizard
sections.toolTip:
Creates and sets up a circle shape object with the option
to add expression controls

sections.name: Rectangle Wizard
sections.toolTip:
Creates and sets up a rectangle shape object with the option
to add an expression controls

sections.name: Grid Overlay
sections.toolTip: Creates and sets up grid lines in the active comp

sections.name: Connect Elements
sections.toolTip: Creates a responsive connection line between two selected layers

sections.name: Trim Paths Controller
sections.toolTip: Applies an expression control to selected layers for trim paths settings

sections.name: Consistent Stroke Width
sections.toolTip: Retains stroke width appearance when scaling using transform properties

sections.name: Explode Shapes to Layers
sections.toolTip:
Separates shape components in the selected layer
into individual shape layers

sections.name: Merge Shape Layers
sections.toolTip: Combines selected shape layers into one shape layer

sections.name: Select All Strokes
sections.toolTip: Selects stroke properties in the selected shape layers

sections.name: Select All Fills
sections.toolTip: Selects fill properties in the selected shape layers

sections.name: Toggle Fill/Stroke
sections.toolTip:
Toggles between stroke and fill properties
in selected comps or the active comp

sections.name: Cap Join Miter
sections.toolTip:
Sets stroke cap and join options to be consistent
with miter join in selected shape layers

sections.name: Cap Join Round
sections.toolTip:
Sets stroke cap and join options to be consistent
with round join in selected shape layers

sections.name: Cap Join Bevel
sections.toolTip:
Sets stroke cap and join options to be consistent
with bevel join in selected shape layers

sections.name: Find and Replace Text
sections.toolTip:
Finds and replaces text in selected text layers,
comps or across the entire project

sections.name: Text Box Generator
sections.toolTip:
Creates a dynamic backplate for selected text layers
with customizable design options

sections.name: Text Area Limiter
sections.toolTip:
Applies an automatic size constraint on selected text layers
to fit user defined width and height limits

sections.name: Wiggly Text
sections.toolTip: Applies a stop-motion style wiggling letters effect on selected text layers

sections.name: Text Reveal Animation
sections.toolTip:
Creates a smooth text reveal and wipe animation on selected
text layers with animatable options

sections.name: Elastic Motion
sections.toolTip:
Creates an overshoot effect based on the velocity of value
changes with animation options
Works best with short distances of 5 to 7 frames between keys

sections.name: Bounce
sections.toolTip:
Creates a bounce effect based on the velocity of value
changes with animation options
Works best with short distances of 5 to 7 frames between keys

sections.name: Bend
sections.toolTip:
Creates a bend effect setup that takes into account true start
and end point values matching the layer size

sections.name: Delayer
sections.toolTip:
Applies a stack of delayed animation values on selected layers
using the initial property selection as driver
Select the animated property to be the driver,
then select the layers to follow and apply.

sections.name: Auto Fader
sections.toolTip:
Applies an automatic fader function on selected layers
based on layer in/out points with animation options

sections.name: Wiggle Property
sections.toolTip: Applies a wiggle effect on selected properties with animation options

sections.name: Blinker Flicker
sections.toolTip:
Applies a blinking/flickering effect on selected
layers with animation options

sections.name: Spin
sections.toolTip:
Applies an expression control on selected layers
for adding a continuous rotation

sections.name: Stop Motion
sections.toolTip:
Creates a stop-motion animation effect on selected
layers with animation options
